job description: Data Analyst Summary:Signature Consultants is seeking a Data Analyst for an opportunity in Miami, FL. Our client is looking for a Data Analyst to help with the POS team. This person will be screening emails and different data sources to look for anomalies at a global level. Looking for someone who is analytical, a problem solver, and a sharp and highly analytical individual with a high sense of responsibility who likes to deliver above average results.Qualifications:Mindset/AdaptiveHighly Responsible/AccountableProductiveSelf-motivating and PassionateDesire to Excel and SucceedHigh performerAbility to work independentlyHumble personality/Egoless naturePositive AttitudeCreative/InnovativeCritical ThinkerHighly AnalyticalAttentive to DetailThoroughMethodicalProcess-OrientedProficient with Microsoft Office Suit in generalExperienced or Advanced Excel User (with right skill set a less advanced user could be trained)Average knowledge of Outlook, Word, Power PointExperience with Access is a PlusAbout Signature Consultants, LLCHeadquartered in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, Signature Consultants was established in 1997 with a singular focus: to provide clients and consultants with superior staffing solutions. For the eighth consecutive year, Signature was voted as one of the \"Best Staffing Firms to Work For\" and is now the 14th largest IT staffing firm in the United States (source: Staffing Industry Analysts). With 26 locations throughout North America, Signature annually deploys thousands of consultants to support, run, and manage their clients' technology needs. Signature offers IT staffing, consulting, managed solutions, and direct placement services. For more information on the company, please visit www.sigconsult.com. - provided by Dice Data Analyst
